step1.title: Verify Your Identity
step1.description: We need some information to help verify your identity.

step2.title: Verify Your Identity
step2.description: Now let’s add your country of residence.

step3.title: Add Your Address
step3.description: Now let’s add your residential address.

step4.title: Add Your Photo ID
step4.description: Upload a photo of your government-issued ID.

input.description: For the <1>{{country}}</1>, please take a photo of one of the following government-issued IDs.
input.upload: Tap here to select a file

step5.title: Choose Default Currency
step5.description: We’ll use your default currency to show you how much other currencies are worth. You can always change this later.
